```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r packages}
library(tidyverse)
library(magrittr)
```

```{r data}
data <- read_csv("../data/processed/05_cand_skin_results.csv")

proder <- read_csv("../data/processed/05_proder.csv")
```

# Regression models

## Replication of Campos‐Vazquez & Rivas‐Herrera, 2021

```{r m1}
glm(win ~ skin_pp + sex + party + contest,
    data = data, family = "binomial") %>%
  summary()

lm(prop_votes ~ skin_pp + sex + party + contest,
    data = data) %>%
  summary()
```


```{r m2}
glm(win ~ skin_pp + sex + party + contest + incumbency,
    data = data, family = "binomial") %>%
  summary()

lm(prop_votes ~ skin_pp + sex + party + contest + incumbency,
    data = data) %>%
  summary()

```
